task.title: Create a complex slide containing images.
task.shortdesc: This task will guide you through the steps to make a slide containing an image and text. It uses CSS modifications to make a more complex layout.

step.cmd: Reset the Reveal.js defaults as needed.
Add a heading between two "section" elements using an "h2" element.

info.note: A larger or smaller heading can be selected using an "h1" or "h3" element.

step.cmd: Insert an image using the HTML command
If desired, add height and width attributes and adjust so the figure is a pleasing size.
Add "p" element for the text you want to add to the page.
